pullRequest.body:
From sphere-eversion; I'm just upstreaming it.

Co-authored-by: @fpvandoorn

nodes.body: :v: grunweg can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Thanks for the fast reviews!
bors r+

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7487828097/job/20381025208)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7487828097/job/20381024615)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7487828097/job/20381025450)
Why not generalize this to `hf : Inducing f`?
... and upgrade to an `iff`. BTW, we already have `Inducing.isCompact_preimage` but it assumes that the range is closed.

Generalised and upgraded. (I tried that, but got stuck for some reason.)
And yes, I saw the other version already. :-)

This def isn't definitionally nice. I think the Equiv part should be given by [Equiv.ofInjective](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Logic/Equiv/Set.html#Equiv.ofInjective), but you're free to split by cases etc. to prove continuity.
Also, it should be generalized to Embedding, not just OpenEmbedding (the name is wrong as is).
Something like:
```
noncomputable def _root_.Embedding.homeomorph (h : Embedding f) : Homeomorph α (range f) :=
  (Equiv.ofInjective f h.inj).toHomeomorph _
```
Nice find. I've dropped that lemma.

```suggestion
lemma Inducing.isCompact_preimage_iff {f : X → Y} (hf : Inducing f) {K : Set Y}
    (Kf : K ⊆ range f) : IsCompact (f ⁻¹' K) ↔ IsCompact K := by
  rw [hf.isCompact_iff, image_preimage_eq_of_subset Kf]

/-- The preimage of a compact set in the image of an inducing map is compact. -/
lemma Inducing.isCompact_preimage' {f : X → Y} (hf : Inducing f) {K : Set Y}
    (hK: IsCompact K) (Kf : K ⊆ range f) : IsCompact (f ⁻¹' K) :=
  (hf.isCompact_preimage_iff Kf).2 hK

```
If you don't care about the order of arguments, then you may also use `alias` to generate the latter theorem (or drop it in favor of the first version).
Changed. I've kept the second lemma for now (that can happily be changed later).

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: two topology lemmas
